description: Download or Copy file with Extrac32 Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Extrac32 Execution
query: (process.command_line:*extrac32.exe* AND process.command_line:*.cab* AND process.command_line:(*\/C* OR *\/Y* OR *\ \\\*))
